dcterms:creator: K. Soomro
A. R. Zamir
M. Shah
dcterms:description: The UCF-101 dataset is one of the most popular action recognition benchmarks. It consists of 13,320 video clips of 101 human actions (27 hours in total). The 101 classes are divided into five groups: Body-Motion, Human-Human Interactions, Human-Object Interactions, Playing Musical Instruments, and Sports.
dcterms:title: UCF-101

dcterms:creator: Y.-G. Jiang
G. Ye
S.-F. Chang
D. Ellis
A. C. Loui
dcterms:description: The CCV dataset contains 9,317 YouTube videos annotated according to 20 classes, which are mainly events like 'basketball', 'graduation ceremony', 'birthday party', and 'parade'.
dcterms:title: Columbia Consumer Videos (CCV)
